_ABOUT_US: Our story started with wanting us to have a common design together as twin sisters. 15 years of experience has given birth in 2022 with the Signes brand . The aim of our baby brand is to create a fragrance identity for the audience we reach. In this way, our motto is “signature of the essence” and to be able to experience the discovery of turning dreams into reality. While a good analysis enables us to reveal a portrait of fragrance combined with details, the desire to make the most beautiful integrates with our perfectionist style. Why not have a signature fragrance for you too?
_ABOUT_US_SECOND: As long as we breathe, our sense of smell is always with us...
